clues.text: In April 2024 this chain announced the 11th comeback of nacho fries to its menu
Pooh's pal Eeyore
It's the flat & padded stretcher rolled down the halls of the hospital
In 2022 Will Smith told this man to "Keep my wife's name out your... mouth"
With a sly grin, Jacques Mondieu entered the National Archives with one goal--like Nic Cage onscreen, to steal this document

(Sterling K. Brown presents the clue.) In May 2007 news,Barack Obama, then holding this office, got Secret Service protection earlier than any candidate ever, attributed to the  historic nature of his campaign
Somehow, heartburn might actually feel good while eating "Movie Nachos" from this 3-letter theater chain
Olivia, in books by Ian Falconer
Que rico! It's a tropicalfruitoften mixed with cream cheese in Cuban pastries
Kim Cattrall said she's "never been friends" with the other stars of this show & we can't help wondering, can co-workers be pals?
M. Mondieu makes a reservation--for thievery!--eyeing safes in this hotel on Central Park South that boasts an "Eloise" suite

(Sterling K. Brown presents the clue.) Candidates get to okay their own code names & those given to their families start with the same letter;Donald Trumpis Mogul &thiscouple, sometimes involved in policy, got Marvel & Mechanic
This snack brand known for its packs of crackers & Oscar Mayer deli meats also sells a Spicy Nachos snack kit
Lyle, Lyle
This Major League Baseball team name was inspired by a set of Art Deco monuments on theHope Memorial Bridge
In November 2024 Jake Paul won by decision over this man, who had postponed the fight when an ulcer flared up
Even Jacques Mondieu thinks twice about stealing this c. 1455 book at the British Library; stealing is frowned upon in it

(Sterling K. Brown presents the clue.) Even when he was only a possible future candidate, President Nixon insisted on giving Secret Service protection tothisman so theagentscould report on any extramarital affairs
Join the "Q" at this restaurant to order a 3-cheese nacho entree with brisket birria
Nutkin & his brother Twinkleberry
The film "Lord of War" was partly based on Viktor Bout, who had this notorious 1-word profession
Asked her opinion about J Lo, this "Queen of Christmas" diva left some coal in a stocking by saying, "I don't know her"
Just ahead of the Laotian authorities, Jacques crosses the eastern border into this nation & relaxes at a spa in Quy Nhon

(Sterling K. Brown presents the clue.) Protectors fall in love, too, as in "The Bodyguard"; let's not forget "The Sentinel" with Michael Douglas & Kim Basinger; & in real life, this ex-president's daughter,Susan, married one of dad's Secret Service agents in 1979
Frank Liberto of Rico's brought nachos places they hadn't gone before, like the Texas Rangers' ballpark in this city in 1976
Mr. Nilsson, who belongs to Pippi Longstocking
You could say a 1994 Tom Hanks character had this, courage & a strong sense of self
Charlize Theron & Tom Hardy weren't pals making this 2015 film; an editor said it was "clear that those 2 people hated each other"
Mondieu! Jacques somehow passed himself off as the grandson of this woman who abdicated Denmark's throne on Jan. 14, 2024

(Sterling K. Brown presents the clue.) Edith Wilson was the first first lady to have her own agent;thiswoman was the third & scandal ensued whenshe & her protector, James Haley got lost on a hike in the Black Hills for several hours
